title: A Crisscross Sale with Jack and Whitey
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: A Crisscross Sale with Jack and Whitey
posts.post_content:
Thanks for looking.  There are four cards in this listing Whitey Alperman, Jack Barry plus Criss and Cross

PP F&F or check preferred payment options.
Shipping included in pricing


Whitey with a P150 reverse and an SGC 4.5 grade is available for $150

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/35583/alperman[/IMG]


Jack with a P350 reverse and an SGC 4.5 grade is also available for $150

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/63617/barry[/IMG]


Dode comes with an SC 150NY reverse with an SGC 4.5 grade for $150

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/37492/criss[/IMG]


Monte snuck through PSA grabbing a PSA 4 grade.  His SC350VA reverse is less common than the SC350NY variety.  He is gone $OLD

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-psa/10355/cross[/IMG]
